players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Charlie: "That's a lie! I investigated Alice last night and she's the mafioso trying to frame me."
Diana: "Both Alice and Charlie claim to be detectives, but there's only one detective in this game. One of you is definitely lying, and the liar is most likely the mafioso."

Diana: "Alice, if you're really the detective, you should have investigated someone other than Charlie first night since claiming detective this early makes you a target. Charlie, your counter-claim seems defensive. I'm leaning towards voting Charlie."
You: "I investigated Charlie and he is mafioso. Diana is right - only one detective exists. Charlie's counter-claim proves he's lying since I'm the real detective."
Charlie: "Alice is lying. I investigated Diana last night and she's the detective. Alice is the only mafioso left."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
